name: es9018k2m
description: Hardware control for ES9018K2M DAC via I2C with automatic volume synchronization
author: Just a Nerd

volumio_info.details: Hardware control for ES9018K2M DAC via I2C. Hardware, Software, or Pass-through volume modes. Hardware enables volume slider with Mixer Type: None. Pass-through for use with Allo Relay Attenuator or external pre-amp. Safe startup volume, start muted, remember last volume, graceful volume ramping, digital filters (FIR/IIR), DPLL jitter reduction, and balance control.
volumio_info.changelog: v1.2.5 - Added Pass-through volume mode for external attenuators/pre-amps, extended prerequisites documentation
